decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The use hereby permitted shall only operate between the hours of 7.00 a.m. and 11.00 p.m. on any day of the week.  Reason for condition: To safeguard the amenities of the occupants of nearby residential properties.

Condition : 2 - The portable building hereby permitted shall be removed on or before 31 May 1998.  Reason for condition: In the interests of visual amenity, having regard to the short-life materials of construction.

Condition : 3 - The site shall be used for the hire of cars and vans only and shall not be used for the hiring or parking of heavy goods vehicles or coaches.  Reason for condition: To protect the amenities of nearby residents.

Condition : 4 - The car/van hire-related vehicles shall park in the parking area adjoining the permitted portable building only and not in surrounding streets or other off-site areas.  Reason for condition: To ensure the free flow of traffic and to prevent hazards to pedestrian and highway safety.

Condition : 5 - The portable building hereby permitted shall be maintained and finished at all times in a condition satisfactory to the Local Planning Authority.  Reaason for condition: To protect the visual amenities of the area.

Condition : 6 - Notwithstanding the provisions contained in Regulation 6 of the Town and Country Planning (Control of Advertisements) Regulations 1992, no advertisements shall be displayed without the express consent in writing of the Local Planning Authority.  Reason for condition: To protect the visual amenities of the area.

Condition : 7 - No aerials, radio masts, antennae or other telecommunications equipment/structures shall be erected at the site without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.  Reason for Condition: To protect the visual amenities of the area.

Condition : 8 - INFORMATIVE  The Applicant is hereby reminded that an application must be submitted for Advertisement Consent to display the existing signs near the site entrance and on Plough Lane, and for any other proposed advertisements. The appropriate forms are enclosed.
description: USE OF LAND FOR CAR AND VAN HIRE OPERATION, INCORPORATING STATIONING OF PORTABLE BUILDING FOR USE AS OFFICE
